text: Matteo Pessina (born 21 April 1997) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a Midfielder for Monza in the Serie A and Italy National football Team. ==Club Career== He joined Monza in 2013 and He beat Pordenone 6-3 In 30 May 2015. On 30 June 2015 He joined AC Milan. On August 2015 He joined Lecce for loan. On January 2016 He joined Catania for loan. On Summer 2016 He joined Como for loan. On 7 July, 2017 He joined Atalanta. On 25 August 2017 He joined Spezia for loan. On 2023 He joined Monza back. ==International Career== On 20 June 2021 He did beat Wales 1-0 in UEFA Euro 2020 Matches. On 26 June 2021 He scored a goal and beat Austria in extra time 2-1 in UEFA Euro 2020 Matches. On 11 July 2021 He beat England with penalty shootout 1-1 and 3-2 in Penalty Shootout He won in UEFA Euro 2020. ==Honours== Italy U20 *FIFA U-20 World Cup 3rd: 2017. Italy *UEFA European Championship: 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Italian footballers Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Italy at UEFA Euro 2020 Category:A.C. title: Matteo Pessina
